column1: length ball, in the channel, Fernando is happy to leave it alone. The wicketkeeper collected it below knee height
some extra bounce on this occasion. Once again in the channel, maybe a touch closer to the batsman who pushes at it and gets beaten
finally some willow on the leather, length ball outside off, defended tentatively towards covers, not much feet movement there
jagging back in off the seam, Fernando was stuck in the crease, looks to flick away and gets beaten, hit high on the back thigh
this one seams away, in the corridor but too far away from the batsman to invite any shot, shouldered arms
length ball around off, Fernando takes half a step forward and taps it back towards the bowler, a maiden to start with
length ball on the leg stump, Karunaratne looks to flick but misses
length ball on the pads once more, tucked away behind square to get off the mark
length ball but way too outside off, left alone by the batsman
short of length on the stumps, pushed towards the right of mid-on for a quick single, Fernando too is off the mark
length ball outside off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
length ball around middle and leg, Karunaratne is stuck in the crease, looks to flick and misses. Is rapped high, near the thigh. An appeal for lbw but was too high
once again on the pads and fuller too this time, Karunaratne says thank you and clips it towards deep square leg boundary
length ball around off, a bit of shape away, Fernando was looking to work it on the leg side, gets a leading edge towards cover-point, well short of the fielder though
length outside off, comes forward this time and drives it past cover, not enough power behind it and a bigger boundary as well, so won't go all the way
length ball on the leg stump, Karunaratne misses the flick once again but this one perhaps pitched just outside the leg stump and was heading further down
length ball outside off, angling across the batsman this time who was looking to push at it but withdraws his bat at the last moment
fuller and wider outside off, Karunaratne takes a big stride forward before shouldering arms
fuller and wider once again, Karunaratne looks to drive it through extra cover, the ball hits the inner half of the bat and dribbles back towards the bowler
length ball around off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover, a misfield there allows Fernando a single
length ball around off, turns it away towards short midwicket off the back foot
length ball, on middle and off this time, worked away in front of square
length ball around off, forced towards long-on from the back foot
length ball on the stumps, punched towards long-off for another easy single
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards short midwicket
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it down the wicket
a slower one this time, fuller and wider outside off, Fernando picks it up late, looks to drive it through the off side and misses

plumb lbw. Length ball, jagging back in off the seam to bat the bat. Fernando was nowhere near the pitch and was looking to drive through the line, misses and is struck on the back leg, just around off and middle. The umpire had no doubt in his mind
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it back
looks to drive on the up through covers, was a length ball, away from the body, Perera takes a step forward and goes for the drives, gets an inside edge on to his leg
length ball around off, a bit of away movement there, Perera moves forward and across and taps it in the covers
length ball around off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
some turn and bounce from a length on middle and off, Karunaratne was on the back foot but did well to negotiate the extra bounce and turn it on the leg side
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-off and sets off for a risky single, makes it safely in the end
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it on the off side
length ball on the stumps, looked like an arm ball, punched towards cover off the back foot
fuller on the pads, use of feet from Perera to work it towards square leg
length outside off, enough room there for Perera to free his arms but he gets it from the toe end of the bat, straight towards the point fielder
length ball around off and middle, turned away in front of square leg
length ball but way too wide outside off, needs to be bowled again
length outside off, steers it down towards third man on this occasion
length ball around off, punched firmly off the back foot but straight towards extra cover
a slower one on middle and leg, Perera comes forward and taps it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps this time, Perera drives it on the front foot but cannot beat mid-off
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards square leg off the back foot
one-bounce four over mid-off, was a touch fuller around off, Perera comes forward and just chips it over the mid-off fielder, extension of the arms doing the rest
short of length outside off, goes for his favourite cut but cannot beat the point fielder
skips down once again but this one is too full and on middle and leg, driven towards long-on for one
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover
pitched up and another drives, the extra cover fielder dives to his right on this occasion to make the stop
length ball outside off, goes for the cut but fails to connect
fuller on the pads this time, driven but finds short midwicket
fuller, slower outside off and Perera comes forward and smashes it through covers for four
another slower one, this time on the pads, clipped away towards fine leg
once again rolls his fingers over it, length ball outside off, Karunaratne looks to punch it through the off side but misses as the ball stays low
short of length on middle and leg, flicked away towards deep square leg
length ball outside off, skips down the wicket and punches to the right of the mid-off fielder, nice balance as well there
Mehidy shortens his length this time, punched towards extra cover off the back foot
an arm ball around off stump, Karunaratne goes back and pushes it towards the bowler
length ball on the stumps, worked towards long-on for one
fuller around off, comes down the wicket and drives it towards long-off
flatter and quicker, angling in towards the batsman, who goes back flicks it towards short midwicket
starts with a loosener outside off, slapped towards deep extra cover for one
fuller outside off, driven from the front foot but cannot beat the mid-off fielder
fuller outside off, Karunaratne pushes at it and gets beaten, bounces once more before reaching the keeper
an attempted bouncer but won't work at Soumya's pace, Karunaratne swivels and pulls it down towards deep-backward square leg, the fielder had no chance
length ball on the stumps, Karunaratne pushes at it, was in the air for a while but lands short of the diving midwicket fielder
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
but denied. An arm ball, Perera was already on the back foot to cut it away, ends up chopping it into the ground. No pad there
length ball on the stumps, works it towards short midwicket off the back foot
length ball on the stumps, goes back and punches it towards long-off
fuller around off, a bit of flight there, pushes it towards mid-off, was in the air for a while but away from extra cover
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep point
length ball on the stumps, punched towards sweeper cover off the back foot for one more
too short and too wide and Karunaratne waits on the back foot before cutting it in front of the backward point fielder
slower one on the pads, Karunaratne places it gently towards square leg for one
fuller on the stumps, pushed down the wicket for a single to mid-on
another cutter, on the pads, flicked away towards midwicket for another easy single
short of length on the stumps, slower one again, Perera doesn't get the timing right on the pull as the ball dribbles towards deep square leg
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and pushes at it but straight towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, tossed up a bit, defended from the front foot
a touch fuller outside off, Perera goes for the sweep, gets a top edge but clears short fine leg with ease and gets a boundary
length ball around off, beaten in the flight but does well to open the face of the bat to work it towards short third man
use of feet this time, reaches the pitch of the ball and drives it towards long-off
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point
length ball around off stump, Perera was looking to punch it from the back foot but it keeps coming in with the angle, chopped into the ground in the end
length ball on the stumps, Karunaratne misses the flick and is hit on the pads, but there was an inside edge involved
length ball on middle once more, flicked away towards square leg this time
another appeal for lbw but pitched outside leg this time, Perera goes for the big pull but misses and is rapped on the pads
length ball outside off, punched towards covers off the back foot
short of length outside leg once more, pulled behind square this time
short of length, outside leg once again, whipped away in front of square
slingy arm action, fuller on the stumps, pushed towards short midwicket
too far down the leg side this time and that brings up the 50-run stand between these too
short and dragged down once more, Karunaratne goes back and pulls it behind square leg for four
fuller outside off this time, drives it towards extra cover for one
fuller on middle and leg, goes for the sweep, gloves it towards short fine leg for a single
another short one and another pull, Karunaratne collects four more to deep-backward square leg
fuller on the off stump, comes forward and drives it towards mid-off
length ball outside off, pushes at it and misses as it keeps low, beats the inside edge, wasn't far away from the off stump
length ball around off, tucked away towards midwicket for a couple
short of length on the stumps, goes back and drops it towards square leg
fuller outside off, comes forward and unleashes a big booming drive through extra cover, was a slower one but all that doesn't matter to Perera
length ball outside off, goes for a punch through the covers but gets an inside edge towards short fine leg
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
fuller around off, comes forward and sweeps it towards short fine leg
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards long-on
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards past point, sweeper cover comes across to cut it off
flatter and angled in towards the batsman, who comes forward and taps it towards short midwicket
length ball outside off, playing away from the body, punched back towards the bowler
length outside off once again, pushed towards extra cover
fuller outside off, Karunaratne skips down and hits it towards long-on
fuller outside off once more, turned away towards deep square leg
<b>an outside edge</> but there is no slip. Length ball, angled across the batsman who pushes at it, rolls towards short third man
length around off, looks to create some room but finds the cover fielder with the cut
flatter on the pads, glanced towards short fine leg for a quick single
length ball outside off, punched back towards the bowler
rocks back and pulls into the open space at deep midwicket
walks into the stroke as he works to midwicket
swept ferociously, deep square ran to his left but had no chance even though it was no more than a couple of metres away from him

sees the batsman giving him the charge and tosses this wide, Kusal dabs it away with his bat close to the pad and scampers a single. Gets smacked on the glove as the point fielder swoops in and fires a throw at the non-striker's end. Right on the wrist, top hand. That must hurt. He's wincing in pain and the physio is out to attend to him
drifts in quite a long way from around the stumps, defended back to the bowler
pulled again, down to deep midwicket. Good stop by Sabbir

tamest of tame dismissals and the captain has thrown it away! Premeditates the paddle, bowler slows it down, shortens his length a bit, so gets this on top of the bat and it lobs straight up to Mushfiq. With that pace or the lack of it from Taijul, Dimuth was never going to clear short fine leg.
eased with the spin to long-off to get underway
slides one across on a length, bunted wide of point
drifts in and skids straight on, Mendis gets well forward and blocks
defends with his bat close to the pad as he lunges forward
mistimes a cut to point. Reached out to smack this but didn't get enough bat
looks for that big biff and only gets the thinnest of edges to the keeper! Bangladesh back in this. Length ball slanting away, Kusal goes for an old-fashioned slog over cover, late on the shot. Poor.
snorter! Looks to fend, beaten by pace. Cracker jack of a delivery from Rubel
goes right back into the crease as he defends this shortish delivery angling into the stumps
punched to cover
attacks the stumps with a full delivery, squirted to mid-on
gets well forward and smothers this tossed up delivery
works this wide of midwicket
nice flight, hint of turn too, blocked
pushed back to the bowler, got too close to the pitch
pushed through full on the stumps, kept out
drifting into middle and leg, tucked wide of square leg
sliced into the gap at point, down to the sweeper
beaten as he looks to run this down to third man. Rubel's fizz and extra pace has certainly caught these two by surprise
tucked towards wide mid-on for a single
slashed and this flies wide of the slip fielder. So near, yet so far. Third man had no chance. Chased a wide delivery with minimal feet movement
full on leg, worked into the gap at midwicket
pulled imperiously in front of square! Got on top of the bounce and absolutely clobbered this. Got into position quickly and that did the trick. Also looked a tired delivery from Rubel
defended into the covers
drifting into the pads, worked to midwicket
drifts in and straightens, defended
punched to cover, this was short and deserved to be put away.
eased to midwicket, pressure building.
nice and full on the stumps, defended back
lofted but no timing, just eludes mid-off. Lucky break. Saw the change in pace and decided to take him on, got it off the toe end
steered straight to backward point
works this straight to short fine
punched to long-on
punched into the gap at cover point
dabbed down to third man
shapes to sweep, then pulls to deep midwicket
dips and turns to skew off the outer half of the bat to short cover
forces this wide of cover, Mushfiq yelps 'keeepeeer' but there was no threat of a run out
saved by an inside-edge as he attemped that slog sweep. Would've been dead had he missed it
eased to cover, superb stop by Mehidy. Throwing himself full-stretch to his right
eases to deep cover
on the stumps, defended
dabbed into the off side
leading edge that rolls into the gap at cover
slower and fuller on the stumps, he flicks straight to short fine
dabs this down to third man again, got besides the line of the delivery to do so
eased down to long-on
drifts in and squares him up, defended from the crease
pushed to short cover
dabs it with soft hands between cover and point
rocks back and shapes to cut, gets a thick edge that rolls wide of short third man
defended back, nicely tossed up again
drops short, he rocks back and punches to deep cover
full on the pads, flicked to deep square
punched to long-on as they jog the single
walks into the length ball and taps into the off side. Was looking to whip this square
defended to short cover again, Mathews struggling
leading edge that rolls wide of cover, excellent running. Mithun caught napping at sweeper cover
fetches the pull from outside off but there's no timing, straight to midwicket
squared up  by sharp turn but manages to defend
drifting into the pads and he's swept this beautifully to beat fine leg. Excellent timing. Lent direction to this delivery merely.
defended back as he lunges forward
tucks this wide of midwicket for an easy single
punches to cover
rolls off a thickish inside edge past short midwicket
gentle tap into the off side for a quick single
in the air, just wide of the bowler. Lobbed off a thickish inside-edge as he went for a big-booming drive
swept with the spin into the gap, bisects deep square and deep midwicket
defended back with soft hands
mix-up, no damage done. Punched wide of midwicket, looked for a single.
swept again, no chance for deep square. Into the gap again between that man at deep midwicket
slower and fuller outside off, worked to short midwicket
beaten by this dipping yorker. Looked to work this on the full to midwicket but played too early, done in by the dip. This one moved away a hint as well
gets a thick inside edge on this attempted pull off a full toss, down to deep midwicket
slower length ball, steered straight to backward point
tucks this length ball to deep midwicket, swift work in the deep. This raises the 50 partnership
tucks this to deep square leg
flatter one on the stumps, nurdled to square leg
defended with the spin to short mid-on
whips this down to long-on
steps out and chips this over the infield to deep midwicket even though he didn't get to the pitch
punched down to long-on
goes over the top, the timing top notch! Length ball that nipped back in and Mathews lofted this through the line with disdain
fuller on off, squeezed to cover
slower and fuller outside off, defended back
flayed on the up to deep cover
edged and four! Third man too square, not where Mendis intended but it's a welcome break. Full outside off, he was looking to steer it behind point but got it a lot finer courtesy a thick edge
squeezes this full delivery to short midwicket
length ball down the leg side, possibly the worst ball he has bowled today, Mathews flicks it between the keeper and short fine leg

once again down the leg side, Mathews looks to glance it fine. Was there an edge, looks like yes but Mushfiqur has failed to latch on to that. UltraEdge shows a spike as the ball passed the bat. Wasn't a difficult chance either, will count as a drop
short of length outside off, dabs it towards third man
length ball outside off, defended from the crease
fuller outside off this time, driven firmly but straight towards extra cover
fuller outside off, comes forward and whips but cannot beat short midwicket
short and wide, Mendis gets up on his toes and cuts it behind point for a couple
fuller around off, gets too close to the ball to work it away, defended back
length outside off, goes for the pull but mistimes it into his leg, gets a single as the ball rolls towards square leg
a leading edge lands well short of charging in deep cover fielder, was a length ball outside off, Mathews looked to whip it over midwicket but failed to middle
length ball outside off, pushes it towards long-on on the up
slower length ball outside off, turned away towards short midwicket for a quick single
length ball outside off, backs away and looks to go down the ground, mistimes it towards long-on
a slower length ball, Mendis was early into the shot, chips it uppishly towards the right of short midwicket
length ball outside off, dabs it down towards third man
slower length ball outside off, places it gently towards short midwicket, scampers back for the second
length ball outside off, comes slower off the surface to take a thick outside edge that runs past short third man for four
was shaping up to scoop it over but it's too full and outside off, Mathews adjusts to push it towards mid-on
length ball outside off, pushes from the back foot, a thick outside edge towards short third man
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it back
length ball on the stumps, comes forward and pushes it towards the bowler
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but finds cover-point
length ball on middle and leg, goes back and pulls it behind square leg
length ball around off, Mathews was looking to play it on the leg side, had to defend as the ball stops and turns
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards long-on
back of length outside off, stays on the back foot and taps it behind point for one
a slower length ball outside off, wasn't that short but Mendis still goes for the pull, keeps low to make it more difficult, Mendis misses
length ball this time, extra bounce to hit the bat high as Mendis dabs it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, flicks but fails to beat short midwicket
length ball on the stumps, a straight-bat shot this time for a single to long-on
length ball on the stumps, goes for the sweep, looked like a top edge but goes all the way over deep square leg for a six, short boundary comes handy, and fifty also comes up for Mendis
length again, goes back this time and flicks it towards square leg
short of length outside off, goes back and whips it towards covers
length ball around off, punched back towards the bowler from the back foot
length ball on the stumps once more, worked away towards midwicket, sprints back for the second
length ball outside off, comes forward and works it towards point as the ball spins at him
in the blockhole, just outside off, Mendis jams his bat and sets off as the ball stops near the tram line
length ball outside off, steered towards cover-point

fuller outside off and Mendis has given it his all but lost his shape in the process which meant it got more height than distance, was a slower ball too. Sabbir had to wait for eternity at long-on but pouches it comfortably in the end
another slower one, fuller around off, Mathews was looking to work it on the leg side, ends up playing towards the bowler
fuller around off, flicked away towards midwicket to bring up 200 for Sri Lanka
length ball outside off, looks to cut it hard but the ball moves away from the batsman, beaten
and that's fifty for Mathews, via a streaky boundary. It was fuller outside off, Mathews was looking to work it on the leg side, gets an outside edge through the vacant first-slip area
back of length this time, following the batsman who was moving towards the leg side, defended in the end
a slower length ball outside off, pushed towards mid-off from the back foot
fuller outside off, another leading edge as the batsman was looking to go leg side, two to sweeper cover
fuller on the stumps, chipped away towards midwicket for one
short of length outside off, backs away and flat-bats it but straight towards extra cover
offcutter but short and down the leg side, fine leg is up and Shanaka takes full advantage of that, swivels and pulls it past the short fine leg
fuller around off, flicks it towards midwicket
another offcutter and another outside edge towards third man, Mathews was looking to push it towards extra cover
length ball outside off, moves forward and across to work it towards midwicket
fuller outside off, Mathews comes forward and slog sweeps it behind square leg, offcutter helping his cause as well, one-bounce four
length ball outside off, places it between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
fuller outside off, Shanaka comes forward and launches it over wide long-on, nonchalantly done
fuller and wider this time, Shanaka comes forward and smashes through extra cover this time, long-off had no chance to come around
pitched up and further away from the batsman, hits it squarer this time, sweeper cover keeps it to two
a slower one this time, full outside off, hits it towards long-on, along the ground
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards deep square leg
fuller outside off, comes down the track and lofts it over long-on, clears the fielder with ease, and that makes it 20 runs from the over
a full toss from around the wicket, Mathews comes down and whips it towards deep midwicket
fuller and flatter on the pads, clipped away towards deep square leg
flatter on the stumps, gives himself some room and looks to go over the bowler's head. Mistimes and Sabbir charges in from long-on, reaches there in time but lets it go through his hands
smashes over the bowler's head this time, flat hit for four. Was fuller and wider, Mathews came down and drilled it down the wicket
length ball around off, punched towards short midwicket for one
a low full toss on the stumps, pushed towards long-on, ten from the over
fuller outside off, looks to go over the bowler's head but fails to middle, Sabbir once again comes in, this time from long-off, and takes a good catch tumbling forward in the end
a low full toss outside off, pushed towards deep extra cover for one
a slower one on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
fuller and wider outside off, cuts it towards backward for one
fuller and wider outside off, Jayasuriya goes inside out, up and over deep extra cover, the fielder at the boundary gets a hand to it but can neither catch nor push it back
a low full toss outside off, down the track but mistimes it towards the bowler
a low full toss on the pads, Mathews clears his front leg and swings across, only a single to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, waits for it before dabbing it towards third man
length ball outside off, Mathews comes down the track and flat-bats it towards extra cover, Jayasuriya has to hurry but makes it in the end comfortably
length ball outside off, struck towards deep extra cover off the back foot
fuller outside off, Mathews clears his front leg and slogs it over long-on for his first six of the innings, 89 metres
length ball, angled outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
length ball, way outside off, Mathews moves across and flicks it through midwicket for another four
fuller and wider once more, Mathews dabs it towards short third man this time
a slower length ball on the pads, Jayasuriya swings across, gets enough bat on it to take it to deep-backward square leg boundary
fuller outside off, Jayasuriya looks to go big but ends up slicing it towards covers where Tamim settles under it and takes a tumbling catch with fingers pointing upwards
fuller and wider outside off, hits it towards sweeper cover
fuller on the stumps, goes inside out over extra cover, long-off chases it all the way, puts in the slide and manages to keep it to two
starts with an offside wide, was full but too far away from the batsman

fuller and wider outside off once again, Mathews looks to go big, misses and an appeal for caught-behind. The umpire is unmoved but there was some definite sound as the ball passed the bat. Bangladesh want to review this, and yes, there was a spike. Mathews departs for a brilliant 87

fuller and wider outside off, Akila goes inside out, towards wide long-off. Sabbir once again the man under it and takes it comfortably. But looks like he has hurt his already heavily-strapped hands in the process. Soumya Sarkar is on a hat-trick though

a slower one down the leg side, pushed towards midwicket, they are coming back for a second but the through is weak. Would have been closed had Soumya broken the wicket but he had no idea where the stumps were,
a slower short one outside off, de Silva jumps in the air but misses

dropped by Sabbir at long-on. Length ball on the stumps, de Silva goes aerial towards long-on, Sabbir gets his hands to it, holds on but slips as the momentum takes him to his right and so does the ball. Bounces just inside and goes over the boundary
short of length outside off, another slower one. De Silva upper-cuts it and manages to clear short third man and ends the innings with a boundary
works this gently with the spin to square leg to get off the mark
drifts in a length ball on middle from around the stumps, blocked
leg-side line on a length, worked to deep square
sharp turn back in, looks to steer past slip but this one rolls to him off the glove
punches to midwicket as they amble through
tucks this gently into the leg side with the angle for a quick single
hint of shape back in, punched to mid-on
misfield at midwicket, parried to mid-on, but no run. Hint of movement off a length again, the inswing.
edged and taken! Tamim looks to flay this on the up but feet nowhere near the ball, it's an ugly waft away from the body and Kusal Perera takes a smart catch shoulder height.

massive, massive appeal for lbw. Umpire Nitin Menon is unmoved. I think he thinks there's an inside edge. Sri Lanka don't review after a mini-conference. Oh yes, replays confirm there was a massive inside-edge.
floats this full in search of swing, there is some as Soumya drives this to mid-off
nips away off the seam from length outside off, left alone
defended with the spin to the offside
drift, fizz and turn as it draws him forward and beats his forward prod. Cracker!
drifts in a full delivery on leg stump, kept out
driven with the spin to extra cover
nurdled to short fine as they scamper a quick single
gets outside the line of the stumps as he defends
right behind the line as he defends
feeble push to a length ball slanted across, gets a thick inside edge that rolls past leg stump
full and swinging away, he plays and gets beaten outside off. Top bowling
stands tall and defends this short of length delivery into the off side
nice and full outside off, defended with soft hands
gets a thick inside edge to midwicket as they scamper a run
lunges forward and defends
lofted over the covers, the timing isn't the best, as is the running. It was a real struggle to get back for the second, a better throw and he would've been gone
nudged to short fine leg
appeal for lbw but impact outside off. Was looking to get outside the line to slog sweep and missed
gets well forward and steers with soft hands to short third man
mistimes the sweep to short fine.

has he gloved this leg side to the keeper? No says the umpire. Banged in short outside leg, Soumya beaten for pace as he looks to take him on. I think Sri Lanka appealed only to distract the umpire from calling it wide and they have succeeded.
gets well forward and pushes this to mid-off
defends this length ball to mid-off
floats this full but this is way outside off, wide called and it's a very easy call for the umpire
reaches out to drive but is beaten. Umpire deems this wide again, Soumya had to really reach out again
defends this length ball back to the bowler with hard hands
squared up but gets enough bat to steer this down to square third man
wrists this length delivery to midwicket
drifts in full on the pads, tucked to square leg
gets well forward and defends with soft hands
cuts and misses, looking to rock back and beat point. This skid through
off the pad to midwicket, they scamper across for a leg bye
eased with the spin to short mid-off, looking for a single but sent back
fired full on the pads, squeezed to long-on
length all on middle and leg, worked to square leg
looks to drive over cover, gets a thick outside edge on the bounce to third man
right behind the line of this length ball as he defends
too full on the pads and he flicks this imperiously over midwicket
back-to-back fours! Too short and he picks the length early to help this along one bounce to deep backward square leg

stunning catch! Avishka with the swirler. Had to turn around and run back to take this top-edged flick which he looked to play over square leg. He ran around to his right from midwicket to pluck this.
works this gently behind square for a single
skids one through on a length, worked to square leg
worked with the spin to deep midwicket
taps it gently to point for a quick single
rolls past short fine leg, excellent running to come back for the second
rocks back and cuts, very nicely done. Made room, allowed the ball to slide on and then lent direction when it arrived.
beaten as he looks to flay this over point
yorker-length, honing in towards his toes, tucked to deep fine leg
driven firmly on the up but hit straight to point
looks to attack the stumps and loses his radar in the process as he slips this down leg, acrobatic take by the keeper
pulled in front of square but can't pierce the infield
opens him up with a beauty! Late swing away as Mushfiqur is beaten on the drive
gets half-a-stride in and blocks this length delivery
tossed up on middle, he gets well forward and defends
gentle dab into the off side, looks for a single but is sent back
looks to tap and run but Akila thwarts it again
dabbed to the man coming in from point as they scamper a quick single
sharp turn, breaks back in off a length, defended
nudged to square leg for an easy single
short and wide outside off, Mushfiqur lets it go
glides this to point where Kusal Mendis throws himself to his right to stop it
floats this full and way outside off, easy call for the umpire
no timing on this pull, just manages to clear midwicket
length ball on middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
full and swinging away from outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
there's the wicket. Chases a wide delivery, looking to flay on the up and gets a thick edge to slip. In-form batsman gone
quicker length ball outside off, doesn't offer a stroke
fired full outside off, left alone
taps it into the off side for a quick single
has little clue about the direction of the turn and plays outside the line, the inside edge rolls to square leg
drifts in full on middle, defended back
looks to dab it wide of short midwicket for a single but can't get there
nice and full on the stumps, defended
slower and fuller on the stumps, offers the full face of the bat in defence
length ball on off, defended with soft hands
pulled behind square to deep square leg
slants a length ball across, defended into the off side
right behind the line again as he defends towards point, just the one of the over.
flatter one on the stumps, blocked
worked with the spin to short square leg
driven with the spin to deep cover
this one keeps a touch low as he works this from outside off towards deep midwicket

steps out, gets to the pitch of this delivery and lofts him cleanly down the ground, lands just in front of the sightscreen. He was always looking to play straight and there in lay the beauty of the stroke. Delightful followthrough as well to break the shackles
works this wide of midwicket for a quick single
pulled all along the ground to fine leg
beaten on the pull, way too early into the stroke. Bordering on the risky here
gets outside the line of off and blocks this length delivery

top-edge and he's gone. Taken on the third attempt at fine leg! Fetching the pull from outside off, surprised by the pace so he gets a top-edge. Shanaka can be a skiddy customer as he's shown here. Why would you want to play that from way outside off to fine leg? I really can't fathom. Kumara never looked settled, but somehow managed to hold on as he trembled left and right while running in.
rapped on the pad but the ball pitched outside leg, rolls to square leg and they sneak in a leg bye
gets outside the line of the stumps and defends back
works this down to long-on
under-edge, very tough chance or so to say, if you really have to be harsh. Shaped to cut, got a thick edge as it kept low, flew off the keeper's pad, wasn't far from the hands of first slip
makes room and punches to deep point
cuts hard but straight to point
beaten as he looks to loft this googly over cover. Foxed him nearly
slaps this to deep cover
short of length outside off, some room there as well, Soumya stands tall and cuts it past backward point, sweeper had no chance either
length ball outside off, comes forward and drives it gently towards extra cover
a touch fuller outside off, Soumya drives it towards sweeper cover by opening the face of the bat at impact
length ball outside off, Mahmudullah gets behind and defends
short of length, sixth-stump line, loops to the keeper as Mahmudullah lets it go
length ball, a touch straighter this time, played towards short midwicket with soft hands to sneak in a quick single
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
down the track and looks to take it on the full but the ball dips at the batsman, toe end of the bat and rolls towards square leg
another googly, fuller on the stumps, defended from the front foot
a legbreak this time, length ball on middle and leg, pushed towards square leg off the back foot
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes at it, the ball hits the outer half and goes towards backward point
length ball outside off, tapped behind point for one
down the track and punched over the bowler's head, stepped away towards the leg side and hit it through the line, focused on the placement than power
short of length angling across this time, a well-controlled pulled in front of square for one

what a catch! Perera goes one-handed to his right and pouches the outside edge. Was a length ball in the corridor, Mahmudullah pushes at it, not the best choice with a slip in place as well. Perera was first looking to go both hands firsts but realises he better go one-handed and then supports with other after completing the catch
length ball around off, stays in the crease and taps it in front of square leg
too short and it balloons over the batsman, called a wide for height
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards midwicket
fuller on the stumps from around the wicket, drives it past the diving short extra cover for one
tossed up outside off, Sabbir looks to drill it down the ground but fails to middle as the ball rolls towards mid-off
almost gets him with a googly, bowled slower outside off, Sabbir was playing for the legbreak, gets an inside edge on to the pads
goes for the sweep this time, gets a top edge but well over short fine leg
short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover

fuller outside off, drives towards mid-off, Soumya was looking to come down for a single but extra cover charges towards the ball to prevent the run, even though it's mid-off who eventually fields the ball
short outside off, Soumya rocks backs and cuts it behind point for four
fuller and wider this time, steered towards third man, Lahiru there
length ball outside off, comes forward and taps it towards backward point
short of length outside off, goes for the pull but ends up hitting in into the ground, a single only as the ball dribbles towards midwicket
a short one this time, Soumya was looking to duck and also ramp it over at the same time, fails to connect
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot towards deep point
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover
fuller outside off once more, Sabbir drives it towards long-off this time

fuller on the stumps, goes for the sweep but misses, and is struck in front, was a legbreak from Akila. A huge appeal and given out but Sabbir wants to review it. UltraEdge shows there was some glove involve and that means Sabbir survives
fuller on the stumps, drives inside out towards mid-off
flatter around off, goes back and works it towards long-off
legbreak around off, defended on the off side from the back foot
length ball outside off, punches it towards deep point to <b>bring up his fifty<b>, 100 comes up for the team as well
fuller around off, pushes it towards covers
fuller again, driven past extra cover this time but only a single as long-off comes across quickly
length outside off, pushes it towards deep extra cover for one
short of length on the stumps, punched off the back foot towards the right of sweeper cover
length ball outside off, pushes it towards extra cover from the back foot
fuller around off stump, goes for the drive but gets an inside edge towards fine leg
length ball outside off, dabs into the ground behind the wicket, first slip jumps a bit to make the stop
short of length around off, extra bounce there for Kumara, defended from the back foot

another excellent catch, this time by Dhananjaya de Silva at extra cover, diving to his left - both hands like a goalkeeper. Was a length ball outside off, Sabbir went for the drive but wasn't to the pitch of the ball and hence ended up hitting it in the air. Kumara strikes in his first over, and lifts de Silva in jubilation
back of length outside off, punched towards the right of third man, Rajitha puts in the slide but let the ball slip under him, should have been stopped
a touch fuller this time, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover
fuller on the stumps, driven back towards the bowler
length ball around off, stops a bit at the batsman, pushed down the wicket again
fuller outside off, moves across and turns it towards short midwicket
length outside off, punched towards the left of short third man
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives but cannot get past short extra cover
short of length, some room outside off, Mehidy makes full use of that and cuts it past short third man
short of length on the stumps, tucked away towards midwicket for a couple
fuller and wider outside off, steered towards third man
short of length down the leg side, the batsman lets it go, the bowler gets away with it

short of length outside off, Mehidy was surprised, didn't pick it up and was almost squared up, the ball hits the leading edge on spoons towards extra cover, Dhananjaya de Silva slips a bit there but regains his balance to complete an easy catch
length ball on the stumps, Taijul is stuck in the crease, and just manages to get his bat down in time
squared up once again, was stuck deep inside his crease, but manages to defend in the end
a high full toss from around the wicket, Soumya skips down, looks to go inside out but mistimes it towards wide long-off
and he bowls on the stumps, angling in. Taijul glances it towards fine leg, comes back for the second
length ball outside off, almost goes down on one knee and cuts it towards deep point
fuller and wider outside off, Soumya reaches out and steers it towards point
length ball down the leg side, Soumya misses the glance and is struck on the pads, the ball lobs towards short leg, the keeper comes forward and catches it but no bat involved there
length ball outside off, pushed uppishly towards covers
144kph, length ball outside off, Soumya was looking to cut it away but the extra bounce means the ball flies over the bat
length ball angling across, goes for the pull but misses. An appeal for lbw but was too high and maybe would have missed the off stump on line as well
short of length outside off, worked towards cover-point
bowls fuller around off, pushed on the off side from the front foot
short of length in the corridor, pushes ta it and gets beaten
finally the short one, goes for the pull but not at all in control, one-bounce to Rajitha at fine leg
fuller on the stumps, Taijul goes aerial but doesn't time it well, gets it over midwicket though, and they complete three before the throw comes in
goes for the reverse sweep to an off break on the off stump, misses it completely, wasn't far from the off stump either
length ball around off, defended under his eyes this time
fuller on the stumps, driven back towards the bowler
length ball around off, pushed towards covers from the front foot
fuller on the stumps, a legbreak from Akila, Soumya was deep in his crease, dabs it towards square leg
length ball outside off, steers it towards third man
short of length outside off, kicks off the surface as the batsman leaves it, Perera collecting it near his head
145kph, fuller outside off, goes for the drive, gets an outside edge that flies away through the vacant second slip area
follows that with a bouncer, Taijul looks to pull it away but he's in no position to do that, misses
slower length ball outside off, a legcutter, dabs it towards third man for one
short of length outside off, Soumya gets on his toes, up and over backward point for four, beating the third man's slide
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
fuller on the stumps, pushes it in front of square leg
a touch fuller around off, Soumya skips down and lofts it inside out over extra cover, gets the placement right, two bounces and over the rope
flatter from Akila this time, pushes it towards extra cover
legbreak does the trick. Fuller around off and spinning big to beat the drive, hits the leg stump. Soumya departs for 69. End is nigh
drills this low full toss back to the bowler
floats this full on leg stump, worked to deep square leg
perilously close to off-stump. Yorker length, looks to back away and carve behind point, missed.
makes room and bunts this skiddy incoming length ball to point
hustled for pace as he hops back to defend, gloves it into the leg side
short ball on the body, he somehow manages to get behind the line and defend
lofted over the bowler's head. Length ball, just used his hand-eye coordination to hit it back over with pristine timing.

has a big swipe at this, but misses. In doing so, he dragged his back foot outside the crease and Kusal Perera whipped the bails off MS Dhoni style. The third umpire decided to go upstairs but Kusal gave it out and confidently high-fived the bowler. Replays confirm he was right
googly, spins back in a long way to hit him high on the pad
looks to flick but the bat is late to come down, somehow he's saved by an inside edge
skids one through, the flipper this time. Hits pad, but was off the bat. The bowler thought otherwise, they don't review
works this full toss to midwicket
sharp turn, squared up but manages to block
gets besides the line as he defends
big heave, hit very, very far. Down on one knee, underneath the flight and boom, sailed over deep midwicket
it's the reverse sweep this time, timed outstandingly well
heaved, no long-on and this trickles away to the ropes even as two fielders chased it, but only managed to crash into the advertising triangles.
works this against the turn to midwicket
uppish but worked to deep square, they hare back for the second
appeal for lbw, but this pitched way outside leg. Through with the sweep of this wrong'un even before it arrived. They don't review.
heaved into the gap in style, deep midwicket had no chance as the ball gathered pace as it bounced into the acres of open space. Bisected long-on and deep midwicket to perfection.
gets well forward and blocks
paddled round the corner past short fine leg
swept straight to short fine leg
run out at the striker's end. Turned wide of short fine but the fielder swoops in and fires a rocket throw on the bounce to Kusal Perera who does the rest. Bangladesh have been whitewashed 3-0.
